A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's obvious Rian Johnson either never watched Star Wars or had a secret agenda to ruin it. I say this because SW - is- about Luke\, whether Johnson (and Disney) like it or not.  I spent Episode 7 waiting for Luke\, Episode 8 gave us Luke but turned him into a different person just to have him die a pointless death. I now have no interest in Episode 9.
This was slow\, bloated\, and full of misplaced juvenile humor that had no place in a Star Wars movie.  This simply did not feel like a SW movie at all.
Poe was I guess the new Han\, but he was obnoxious\, impudent\, and a complete ass (not to mention that cringe worthy opening scene). Finn and Rose had no real business in this movie but to extend what should have been a shorter movie and satisfy certain demographics with pointless and incompetent characters who made absolutely no difference to the movie. Don't get me started on Phasma's 2 minute cameo/death scene. 

I'll watch Episode 9... on streaming.
